delete.tip: Are you sure you want to delete this document from index {{indexId}} with primaryKey {{primaryKey}}?
delete.require_primaryKey: Document deletion require the valid primaryKey

limit.label: Limit
limit.validation_error: limit search value allow (<500) in this ui console for performance

sort.label: Sort
sort.tip: use half-width comma(',') to separate multi sort expression and order

autoRefresh.label: Auto Refresh
autoRefresh.tip: After turning it on, the search results will be automatically refreshed (every 7 seconds, when filter conditions change, when the network environment changes). This option will increase QPS. Please pay attention to paid instances!

showRankingScore.label: Show Ranking Score
showRankingScore.tip: This option is only support showRankingScore parameters instance (> v1.3.0) effectively, the _rankingScore field will appear in the returned search results when enabled, please refer to the official document for the meaning of this parameter
